Name: Snowboarding
About the game: Snowboarding is an open-world arcade sports game with scores. Snowboard on the slopes or on special ramps, perform tricks and earn points. There are two cards to choose from. The first set of ramps on which you can perform special tricks, and the second is a large slope on which you can slide at high speed.
